title: Chroma IP Sale?
body: So when exactly is the Chroma IP Sale? I heard about it a few days ago and been looking it up all over the place to see when it is. Does anyone know?

replies.body: Hey, I'm not sure when the next Chroma sale is especially with IP converting to Blue Essence in the preseason.  Check out our [Preseason FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115012640908), though, as you'll be able to use your converted essence at the special Essence Shop.
